name: Gregor Zleip
story: Gregor Zleip was born and raised in a small village in eastern Poland. He was recruited as an informant by a local criminal organization at a young age and has been working with them ever since. Zleip is known for his deceitful nature and ability to gather information from anyone, friend or foe alike. Despite his criminal connections, he is a devout Roman Catholic and is heavily involved in his local church.
